code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{CoreContext}from"./Core";function Greeting(){var coreContext=useContext(CoreContext);return React.createElement("div",{className:"greeting-container"},React.createElement("h1",{className:"greeting"},"Hi ",coreContext.firstName,"!"),React.createElement("div",{className:"greeting-content pt-mono"},"You've worked ",coreContext.totalHours," hours.",React.createElement("br",null),"That equals ",React.createElement("span",{className:"orange-text"},"$"),coreContext.totalHours*coreContext.payRate,"!"));}export default Greeting;
